I wish to bring about issues relating to certain words used in media which manipulate the minds of the public!
According to media reports, a majority of horrific attacks are done by muslim terror organisations.
These organisations are not muslim...they do not hold the right values as a muslim!
They are indeed terror organisations, but in no way muslim!
I wish the government to make it illegal to brand people as part as a faith, if they act in a way that breaches the common values of that faith.
I trust this will be an easy step to take to stop this good country falling into a civil war. Terrorists are not muslim, neither are they from any other faith!!! They are seperate from faith, but have their own culture!
